decision_conditions: The proposed balcony would appear incongruous and result in a discordant feature to the host dwelling and surroundig area. The proposals would detract from the character and appearance of the existing dwelling and the Kingston Hill/Coombe Hill strategic Area of Special Character resulting in unacceptable harm to the character and appearance of the dwelling and the area. The proposal would conflict with Policies D3 & HC1 of the London Plan 2021, paragraphs 199 to 208 of the NPPF 2021 and Policies CS8, DM10 & DM12 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy 2012.

By reason of height and sitting, the proposed balcony would result in unacceptable overlooking and a loss of privacy to the closest neighbouring properties, contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.
description: Demolition of the existing front porch, side extension and rear garage, erection of two storey side and rear extension with balcony to the rear, and erection of single storey front porch extension. Erection of roof extension and installation of 5nos. side and 1no. front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion. Alterations to front fenestration
